publicationPlace: [WorcesterImprinted the last daye of february. Anno Domini. 1549. Dorceter
title: The seconde parte of the Domesticall or housholde sermons for a godly housholder, to his childre[n] and familie: compyled by the godly learned man Christopher Hegendorffine, doctor most necessarye for all faythefull housholders: now first translated out of laten in to English by Henry Reginalde.
author: Hegendorph, Christoph, 1500-1540.
publisher: By Jhon Oswen. Cum priuilegio Regali, ad imprimendum solum. Per Septennium],
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
